department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Ordered until February 28, 2023, with an optional extension, contract includes items based on demand.
description: The contract requires the incineration of 119 pallets of expired Wipe Canisters with an average weight of 450 kg per pallet.
duration_in_months: This contract can be extended for a possible three months,  because of an optional extension for 1 month periods.
full_summary:
# Incineration of Expired Wipe Canisters

## Tender Announcement

### Reference

* Secure Tender Reference: WS3791824085-Doc3792174030
* Amendment Number: 4
* Solicitation Number: WS3791824085

### Deadline

* Publication Date: December 16, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: January 5, 2023, 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: January 12, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 23, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: April 30, 2023

### Tender Status

* Status Eng: Expired
* Status Fra: Expiré

### Tender Details

* Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN): None
* UNSPSC Code: 76122203
* UNSPSC Description: Incineration for Hazardous Waste
* Procurement Category: SRV

### Procurement Method

* Tender Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Tender Type: Request for Proposal
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

* Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Locations

* Region of Opportunity: Alberta
* Delivery Location: Alberta

### Contracting Entity and End User

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Contact Information

* Project Manager: Aroune, Hassen (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [hassen.aroune@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:hassen.aroune@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

## Tender Description

PSPC requires the services of incineration of expired Wipe Canisters. The contract is expected to start on January 23, 2023, and end on April 30, 2023. The contract may be extended by up to three additional one-month periods under the same conditions. The Request for Proposal (RFP) will be distributed to the qualified holders of the EW479-162880 Hazardous Waste Services Supply Arrangement (SA).
